name: KeyByAmazon
0:
”Alexa, lock my front door.”
”Alexa, is the front door locked?”
”Alexa, unlock my front door.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
If you have a Key by Amazon-compatible smart lock and an Alexa-enabled device, and you've already set your devices up in the Key app, then you can:
- Lock your door
- Unlock your door with voice PIN
- Check the status of your lock

To get started
1. Tap on “Enable Skill”
2. You will be asked to authenticate using Amazon username and password.
3. To discover the Key by Amazon device, either tap on ‘Discover Devices’ or say “Alexa, discover new devices.” This can take up to 20 seconds.

To enable 'Unlock by Voice':
After enabling the Key skill and discovering the devices, go to Alexa mobile app and follow these steps: Menu > Smart Home > Tap on your Key device > Edit (on top right) > Unlock by Voice. 
When you enable "Unlock by Voice" in the Alexa app, you must also set a 4-digit code that is required when unlocking your smart lock.
